headline: BROOKS AUTOMATION WAFER TRANSFER ROBOT AND ALIGNER
specstable:
Manufacturer Brooks Automation
Model ACUTRAN 7
Description Wafer Transfer Robot & Aligner
Accessories Robot arm p/n: 002-7090-04
Control module p/n: 002-5870-07
Wafer aligner p/n: 002-7391R07
Control pendant
Cables
NB: Power supply to be supplied by customer, 24V 30A.
Other Information Specifications
  • Radial axis stroke:
    Range of motion: 32.16 in
    Speed: 24 in/sec
    Repeatability: 0.003"
  • Rotational axis:
    Range of motion:Infinite
    Speed: 360 Deg./sec
    Repeatability:0.10 Deg.
  • Z Axis:
    Range of motion:17.25 in
    Speed: 12 in/sec
    Repeatability:0.003"
  • Transfer time: 4.5 sec
  • Wafer size: 100mm to 300mm
  • Load capacity: 1.2 Lbs.
  • Arm:Two link "SCARA" type

    Robot configured to application: F4-W3-V53-1-W3, V1.6
    • Condition Very Good
    Exterior Dimensions
    Width 10.750 in (27.3 cm)
    Height 27.500 in (69.9 cm)
    Weight 130 lb (59 kg)
